meanings.sent1: The king ordains that all citizens must wear a crown on Sundays.
meanings.sent2: The judge ordains a fair trial for the accused.
meanings.sent3: The teacher ordains a homework-free week for the students.
meanings.sent4: Nature ordains that the sun rises every morning.
meanings.sent5: The constitution ordains the rights of every individual.

meanings.definition: To appoint or establish by law or decree
meanings.sent1: The company ordains John as the new CEO.
meanings.sent2: The government ordains safety regulations for all industries.
meanings.sent3: The chef ordains a pizza party for the staff.
meanings.sent4: Destiny ordains that we meet certain people in our lives.
meanings.sent5: Tradition ordains the passing down of family heirlooms.
